name: Thornveil Marsh
description: A waterlogged expanse of twisted mangroves and stagnant pools, where mist clings to the ground and strange lights flicker in the distance.
imageStyle: fantasy digital painting, dark swamp atmosphere, murky greens and browns, fog and mist, slightly painterly, fixed perspective, JRPG background, stage-like composition
imageNegativePrompt: modern, cars, electricity, sci-fi, top-down, isometric, characters, people, figures, bright cheerful

rooms.name: Marsh Edge
rooms.description: The forest floor gives way to soft, waterlogged earth. Gnarled mangrove roots rise from murky pools, and the air grows thick with the stench of decay. A low-hanging mist obscures everything beyond a few paces. The ruins lie safely to the south, while the marsh stretches ominously northward and eastward.
rooms.imagePrompt: First-person view standing at the edge of a dark swamp. Soggy ground transitioning from forest earth to muddy marsh filling the lower third. Gnarled mangrove roots emerging from stagnant water. Low-hanging fog obscures the distance. Sickly green-brown palette. No people or creatures.
rooms.imageStyle: fantasy digital painting, dark swamp atmosphere, murky greens and browns, fog and mist, slightly painterly, fixed perspective, JRPG background, stage-like composition
rooms.imageNegativePrompt: modern, cars, electricity, sci-fi, top-down, isometric, characters, people, figures, bright cheerful

rooms.name: Sunken Trail
rooms.description: A half-submerged trail of rotting planks stretches across the mire, many boards cracked or missing entirely. Dark water ripples on either side, disturbed by unseen things beneath the surface. The path continues north toward the heart of the marsh, while a gap in the undergrowth leads west to a darkened hollow.
rooms.imagePrompt: First-person view standing on a half-submerged wooden plank trail across a dark swamp. Rotting planks filling the lower third, dark murky water on both sides. Twisted dead trees draped in hanging moss. Thick fog ahead. Eerie green-brown atmosphere. No people or creatures.
rooms.imageStyle: fantasy digital painting, dark swamp atmosphere, murky greens and browns, fog and mist, slightly painterly, fixed perspective, JRPG background, stage-like composition
rooms.imageNegativePrompt: modern, cars, electricity, sci-fi, top-down, isometric, characters, people, figures, bright cheerful

rooms.name: Fetid Shallows
rooms.description: Ankle-deep water stretches in every direction, broken only by tufts of swamp grass and the occasional rotting stump. Bubbles rise sluggishly from the muck below, releasing foul-smelling gas. Something large disturbed the water recently — fresh tracks lead north toward a small island.
rooms.imagePrompt: First-person view standing in ankle-deep murky swamp water. Shallow brown water filling the lower third with tufts of swamp grass. Bubbles rising from the muck. Rotting stumps scattered about. Low fog layer. Oppressive green-brown atmosphere. No people or creatures.
rooms.imageStyle: fantasy digital painting, dark swamp atmosphere, murky greens and browns, fog and mist, slightly painterly, fixed perspective, JRPG background, stage-like composition
rooms.imageNegativePrompt: modern, cars, electricity, sci-fi, top-down, isometric, characters, people, figures, bright cheerful

rooms.name: Hag's Hollow
rooms.description: A dark depression in the marsh, ringed by ancient willows whose drooping branches form a natural curtain. The water here is unnaturally still and black as ink. Strange totems of bone and feather hang from the branches, clicking softly in a breeze you cannot feel. This place reeks of dark magic.
rooms.imagePrompt: First-person view standing in a dark hollow in a swamp, ringed by ancient weeping willows. Black still water filling the lower third. Bone and feather totems hanging from branches. Eerie otherworldly atmosphere, dark magic feel. Faint sickly green glow. No people or creatures.
rooms.imageStyle: fantasy digital painting, dark swamp atmosphere, murky greens and browns, fog and mist, slightly painterly, fixed perspective, JRPG background, stage-like composition
rooms.imageNegativePrompt: modern, cars, electricity, sci-fi, top-down, isometric, characters, people, figures, bright cheerful

rooms.name: Mire Island
rooms.description: A rare patch of solid ground rises from the swamp — a small island of packed earth and moss-covered stones. The remains of a campfire suggest someone or something shelters here. The island offers a commanding but unsettling view of the marsh in every direction, with the dark heart of the swamp visible to the west.
rooms.imagePrompt: First-person view standing on a small island of solid ground in the middle of a vast swamp. Packed earth and moss-covered stones filling the lower third. Remains of a campfire in the mid-ground. Swamp water surrounding the island in all directions. Fog-shrouded vista. No people or creatures.
rooms.imageStyle: fantasy digital painting, dark swamp atmosphere, murky greens and browns, fog and mist, slightly painterly, fixed perspective, JRPG background, stage-like composition
rooms.imageNegativePrompt: modern, cars, electricity, sci-fi, top-down, isometric, characters, people, figures, bright cheerful

rooms.name: Heart of the Marsh
rooms.description: The deepest part of the Thornveil Marsh, where the mist is so thick it seems almost solid. Ancient trees have petrified here, their stone trunks rising like pillars from the black water. Will-o'-wisps dance in the gloom, leading the unwary deeper into the mire. To the north, the ground rises sharply — the dark mouth of a rocky gorge yawns open.
rooms.imagePrompt: First-person view standing in the deepest part of a dark swamp. Black water and petrified ancient tree trunks rising like stone pillars. Thick almost-solid mist. Faint will-o'-wisp lights floating in the gloom. Rocky cliff face visible ahead with a dark gorge entrance. No people or creatures.
rooms.imageStyle: fantasy digital painting, dark swamp atmosphere, murky greens and browns, fog and mist, slightly painterly, fixed perspective, JRPG background, stage-like composition
rooms.imageNegativePrompt: modern, cars, electricity, sci-fi, top-down, isometric, characters, people, figures, bright cheerful

npcs.name: Bog Lurker
npcs.description: A hulking amphibious creature that rises from the murky water, its scaled hide caked with mud and algae. Webbed claws reach outward as it drags itself across the marshy ground, leaving a trail of slime.
npcs.imagePrompt: Full-body hulking amphibious swamp creature with scaled hide caked in mud and algae, webbed claws, wide jaw with jagged teeth, rising from water in aggressive pose facing the viewer. Single creature, isolated on solid transparent background, no ground, no scenery.

npcs.name: Venomous Bog Toad
npcs.description: An enormous toad the size of a pony, its warty skin glistening with toxic mucus. It sits perfectly still until prey wanders close, then strikes with terrifying speed, its barbed tongue lashing out to ensnare victims.
npcs.imagePrompt: Full-body enormous warty toad the size of a pony, glistening toxic mucus on bumpy skin, wide mouth with barbed tongue, sitting in aggressive crouch facing the viewer. Single creature, isolated on solid transparent background, no ground, no scenery.

npcs.name: Marsh Wraith
npcs.description: A spectral figure wrapped in tattered robes that seem to bleed into the mist itself. Its hollow eyes burn with a cold blue flame, and its skeletal hands crackle with necrotic energy. The temperature drops sharply in its presence.
npcs.imagePrompt: Full-body spectral wraith figure in tattered rotting robes that dissolve into mist, hollow eyes burning with cold blue flame, skeletal hands crackling with dark necrotic energy, floating menacingly facing the viewer. Single creature, isolated on solid transparent background, no ground, no scenery.

npcs.name: Mire Hag
npcs.description: A hunched crone with sickly green skin and matted hair entwined with marsh weeds. She clutches a staff of twisted bone, and her eyes gleam with malevolent cunning. The totems hanging in her hollow pulse with dark magic at her approach.
npcs.imagePrompt: Full-body hunched crone witch with sickly green skin, matted hair entwined with marsh weeds, clutching a twisted bone staff, malevolent gleaming eyes, tattered robes, dark magic aura, facing the viewer.
